## ICobuildContext interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICobuildContext 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[cacheId](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.cacheid.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The id of the cache entry. It should be kept the same as the normal cacheId from ProjectBuildCache. Otherwise, there is a discrepancy in the success case wherein turning on cobuilds will fail to populate the normal build cache.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[clusterId](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.clusterid.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The id of the cluster. The operations in the same cluster share the same clusterId and will be executed on the same machine.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[completedStateKey](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.completedstatekey.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The key for storing completed state.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[contextId](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.contextid.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The contextId is provided by the monorepo maintainer, it reads from environment variable . It ensure only the builds from the same given contextId cooperated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[lockExpireTimeInSeconds](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.lockexpiretimeinseconds.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The expire time of the lock in seconds.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[lockKey](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.lockkey.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The key for acquiring lock.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[packageName](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.packagename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The name of NPM package

Example: `@scope/MyProject`


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[phaseName](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.phasename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The name of the phase.

Example: \_phase:build


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[runnerId](./rush-lib.icobuildcontext.runnerid.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** The id of the runner. The identifier for the running machine.

It can be specified via assigning `RUSH_COBUILD_RUNNER_ID` environment variable.


</td></tr>
